data.eml:eml: Description of a new Hemigrammus Gill (Characiformes: Characidae) from the río Madeira basin in Peru and Bolivia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ota, Rafaela P., Lima, Flávio C. T., Hidalgo, Max H. (2019): Description of a new Hemigrammus Gill (Characiformes: Characidae) from the río Madeira basin in Peru and Bolivia. Zootaxa 4577 (2): 335-347, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4577.2.6
